attributes.review: Ever since I downloaded this app, I have felt the constant urge to say the n word. And every time I see an Asian American. I suddenly cough and say kung-flu. I don’t get it. It won’t stop. I’ve been getting oranger and oranger every single day. Someone call AHHHHH
attributes.title: Made me racist

attributes.review: I’m a very big trump supporter (false) but I wanted to see what this app was about, this app took 3 days to download, and also the sign up was so annoying and frustrating! Take notes from these reviews! Nobody likes the app!!
